alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Mitchell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:50AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Mitchell, Colquitt and southern Worth Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1150 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Baconton, or 9 miles south of Putney, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Pelham, Camilla, Norman Park, Baconton, Doerun, Riverside, Schley, Funston, Sale City, Bridgeboro, Minton, Flint, Scooterville, Anderson City, Tempy, Parkerville, Cotton, South Moultrie and Lester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
